titles: The brave boys of Bristol. Bristol boys come side with me, for I do here declare, such bonny lads you seldom see, none with them may compare
publisher: Printed for J. Deacon, at the Angel in Guiltspur-street,
notes: "Tune is, Hey Boys Up Go We; Jenny Gin; Busie Fame; or, Russels Farewel."
Place and date of publication from Wing (CD-ROM edition).
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
